newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Deelkraal seismic event toll now at eight.
newsitem.headline: Deelkraal seismic event toll now at eight.

text.p: Deelkraal Gold Mining Co Ltd said on Thursday the death toll now stood at eight following a seismic event at 2,600 metres below surface in an area served by the No 1 sub-shaft at around noon on Wednesday.
Another two employees were still unaccounted for and rescue operations were continuing, Deelkraal said in a statement.
The mine said 24 workers were injured in the fall of ground accident. The seismic event measured 3.3 on the Richter scale.
Deelkraal did not say whether production had been affected by the seismic event.
The mine produced 1,930 kg of gold in the three months to end-March, 1997.
